vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κῡρι-ότης, ητος, ἡ,
dominion, [NT]
__2 later, concrete, authority, [Refs 6th c.AD+]
__II proper, legitimate use of a term, [Refs 5th c.AD+]; = Latin proprietas, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
authority, dominion, power, lordship
lordship; constituted authority, Eph. 1:21; 2Pet. 2:10; Jude 8; plural authorities, potentates, Col. 1:16. The Ephesian and Colossian passage could also be speaking about angelic powers.*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: poder espiritual (angelical) (que se cree que tiene cierto control sobre el destino de los seres humanos) ; autoridad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 統治權, 權力, 主權 (彼後 2:10; 猶8)
2) 擁有統治權的人 (弗 1:21; 西 1:16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 统治权, 权力, 主权 (彼后 2:10; 犹8)
2) 拥有统治权的人 (弗 1:21; 西 1:16)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự tể trị; sự thống trị; các vua chúa / trong TƯ: ai có quyền thống trị
